about_the_game:
Synopsis

Eternal Dreamers -Rising- continues the popular battle-focused RPG series! New characters, items and challenges await! However you choose to fight, that's up to you! With an overhaul of several gameplay systems and graphical components, Eternal Dreamers shines brighter than ever!

Features

  • Experiment with 13 playable classes, making for a grand total of 715 unique party combinations!
  • Prove your strategic superiority in the game's many quest types!
  • Knock yourself out hunting for countless weapons, armors and other items!
  • Take a breather in a vast number of elaborate minigames!

Story

Following the outbreak of a mysterious illness, people fall into an unending coma from which there is no awakening. After months of loss, researchers at the Advent conglomerate discover that victims share the same dream, and succeed in creating a bridge to their new reality. What they find is a world between worlds, connected to many more than our own. And inside this world, the race to end the Sudden Coma Phenomenon begins!

What's new in Rising?

  • Two new playable classes! Shana, the wild gunslinger, and Raze, the draconic brawler!
  • Test your strength against Death's forces in the all-new quest type SUPPRESSION!
  • Countless new items to hunt!
  • Complete rebalancing of the game, including party members, enemies and all items!
  • Tons of new graphics, music and UI redesigns for an even more compelling experience!

name: ETERNAL DREAMERS -RISING-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything w/ OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: When a mysterious disease causes people to fall into a coma across the globe, it's up to you to put an end to it! The next entry in the battle-focused RPG series offers deep tactical combat action! With a wide selection of classes and equipment, you choose how to fight!
